settings.title: Thought Leadership
settings.subtitle: Our partners bring decades of experience from Tier-1 OEMs and private equity.

settings.name: Jerrold Lundquist
settings.title: Managing Director
settings.bio: Aerospace & Defense strategy specialist. Previous leadership at Tier-1 primes and board-level advisory.

settings.heading: 1) Rapid Assessment
settings.content: Discovery sessions, KPI baseline, stakeholder mapping. Diagnostic brief & 90‑day plan.

settings.heading: 2) Options & Business Case
settings.content: Scenario design, sensitivity analysis, resourcing plan. Options memo & board‑ready deck.

settings.heading: 3) Execution Support
settings.content: Workstream leadership, vendor coordination, tracking. Weekly progress reports & KPI roll‑ups.

settings.heading: 4) Transition & Training
settings.content: Knowledge transfer, playbooks, handover workshop. SOPs, dashboards, close‑out brief.

settings.heading: Defense prime (Buy‑side)
settings.description: Led diligence for avionics acquisition; identified $34M synergy case & risk mitigation plan. Closed on time.

settings.heading: PE platform (Ops)
settings.description: Stabilized supply chain; 11‑point margin recovery in 90 days; cash conversion +18% within 2 quarters.

settings.heading: Dual‑use startup (Go‑to‑market)
settings.description: Won first government program; built partner ecosystem; $12M pipeline in 6 months.

settings.text: The Lundquist Group provided invaluable insight into our federal procurement strategy. Their expertise in ITAR compliance and supply chain risk was a game changer.
Exceptional clarity and professionalism. The 90-minute executive briefing gave us a clear 3-year roadmap that we are already executing on.
Highly recommended for any defense prime looking to optimize their operational overhead. Real-world experience that translates to bottom-line results.
